Introduction
^^^^^^^^^^^^


These docs serve the purpose to contain all information about ATC's P8 smartwatch custom firmware.

The P8 smartwatch has many :ref:`great features <Hardware overview>` like:

* :ref:`Bluetooth LE <NRF52832>`, 
* :ref:`HRS 3300`, 
* pedometer, 
* imu, 
* vibration motor,
* color/touch screen,
* has 1 external button,
* it is waterproof


It can be programed with Arduino, and flashed through BLE without opening.

`Discord Server <https://discord.gg/xU2zMBR>`_  where almost all discussion takes place
